feed.title: Yixi Zhou
feed.subtitle: Personal website of Yixi (Xander) Zhou, incoming Ph.D. student in computer science at Hong Kong Baptist University (2026, advised by Renchi Yang). Research direction: data agent. Member of HKBU LAGAS Group (Database Lab). Remote RA at MBZUAI (financial AI, Preslav Nakov and Zhuohan Xie). B.S. from ShanghaiTech University and University of Wisconsin-Madison.
